post.text: Trump is hiding his tax returns, specific details about basically all his policy proposals, and the facts about his charitable giving. So is it any surprise that he's hiding his medical records, too?

comment.author: Tyler
comment.text: The public has lost all respect for Hillary because she hides so much with her veil of lies. Instead of answering to her transgressions, she attempts to attack Trump in a vain attempt to draw away the public opinion. And her bunch of blind sheep bow deep in denial.

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: Why do we believe Trump's taxes are being audited? Because he's told us so? He could be lying. Because his attorneys have said so? They could be lying. There is a document Trump could release to prove his taxes are being audited beyond any doubt. It is a letter titled "Notice of Audit" from the IRS. Every person or business being audited gets one. The Notice doesn't reveal anything personal. The Notice doesn't reveal any part of the tax return in question. It simply announces an audit. We should demand Trump release his a "Notice of Audit" for every year he refuses to show us, and if he does not we should demand he stops claiming he can't release his income tax returns because of IRS audits. It's that simple.

replies.author: Robert

Obey the immigration laws of the nation! End sanctuary cities! Make America as great as it was when I legally migrated here!I AM NOT YOUR TACO VOTE!
